tasks.title: Project scaffolding and Fabric environment validation
tasks.description: Confirm Fabric 1.21 environment, mappings, and mod metadata are correct.
tasks.details: Validate `fabric.mod.json`, Gradle versions, and entrypoints for client/main. Ensure Java Yarn mappings align with 1.21.

tasks.title: Design input buffer data model
tasks.description: Define BufferedInput class and enums for input types.
tasks.details: Fields: timestamp(ms), slot(0-8), type(ATTACK, USE, SWAP, PLACE, INTERACT). Include javadoc and null-safety.

tasks.title: Implement high-frequency input buffer (1kHz)
tasks.description: Capture inputs at ~1000Hz and enqueue into rolling buffer.
tasks.details: Thread-safe ring buffer with millisecond resolution; minimize allocations.

tasks.title: Hook KeyBinding and input sources
tasks.description: Intercept hotbar swaps, attack, use, interact; optional Screen.onKeyPressed.
tasks.details: Mixin KeyBinding events and map to BufferedInput entries with slot mapping.

tasks.title: Tick downsampling flush (20 TPS)
tasks.description: On each client tick (50ms), resolve inputs and execute one action.
tasks.details: Use ClientTickEvents.END_CLIENT_TICK; collectSinceLastTick; execute chosen input.

tasks.title: Resolution rule: First-input-wins
tasks.description: Default rule picks the earliest input within the tick window.
tasks.details: Stable selection by minimal timestamp; deduplicate identical inputs.

tasks.title: Priority mode for hotbar slots
tasks.description: Optional priority list to favor certain slots/items.
tasks.details: Allow config-defined slot order; break ties by list order, then timestamp.

tasks.title: Config system (config/ticklock.json)
tasks.description: Expose mode, buffer_rate, and priority_slots in JSON config.
tasks.details: Load on startup with sane defaults: mode=FIRST, buffer_rate=1000, priority_slots=[].

tasks.title: Combo consistency behaviors
tasks.description: Ensure sequences (crystal→punch→totem, axe→sword, etc.) stay reliable.
tasks.details: Validate chosen input execution preserves user intent without automation.

tasks.title: Edge cases handling
tasks.description: No input → no action; ignore when in GUI or dead; deduplicate repeats.
tasks.details: Guard conditions in tick flush; short-circuit rules.

tasks.title: Debugging and logs
tasks.description: Add minimal debug logging in dev/test; off in production.
tasks.details: Optional overlay for future; start with structured logger tags.

tasks.title: Documentation and success criteria validation
tasks.description: Document how to configure and verify smoother inputs.
tasks.details: README section and simple how-to; map to PRD success criteria.
